_meanings:
{@--1@} A cloth girt round the
legs and knees (by a person),
when sitting on his hams; also, the
act of girding round this cloth, or
the posture itself; {#SayAnaH prOQapAdaSca#}
{#kftvA cEvAvasakTikAm#} <ls>Ms. 4. 112</ls>;  
{#ahinA avasakTikAbaMDahetuBUtena#} <ls>Malli.</ls> on
<ls>Ki. 12. 22.</ls>

{@--2@} (Hence) A wrapper,
a girth or band in general.
